Package brain

Class PaperWinner

java.lang.Object
actor.BotBrain
brain.PaperWinner
public class PaperWinner extends BotBrain
PaperBoy acts like MinerBot until 20 rocks, Then goes to middle and bids on Papers (bid is 1 each time)
